               (EN)   Simple Wii Series Vol. 1: The Minna de Kart Race

This make is D3 company for the Japanese market launch of the " Simple Series" landed first work Wii platform , the game uses a similar Mario Kart racing series to compete , and the use of the unique Wiimote somatosensory function , it can be more intuitive were driving it!

This work not only supports split-screen four against, but also supports a global game through Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection.
